content:
Q: What does Maid Protect360 PRO cover?
A: Maid Protect360 PRO provides comprehensive and high-value coverage for all employers and their domestic helpers in Singapore. Our maid insurance plan covers payout on Hospital and Surgical Expenses, Personal Accident protection, Alternative Maid services, Waiver of 25% Co-Payment (for Enhanced plans and above) and even outpatient privileges for the maid with subsidised consultation fee for medical and dental services.
questions: What types of expenses does Maid Protect360 PRO cover?
Is personal accident protection included in Maid Protect360 PRO?
What are the benefits of the Alternative Maid services in Maid Protect360 PRO?
Does Maid Protect360 PRO offer outpatient privileges for maids?
What is the co-payment waiver for Enhanced plans in Maid Protect360 PRO?
Are medical and dental services subsidized under Maid Protect360 PRO?
Who is eligible for coverage under Maid Protect360 PRO?
What is the geographical coverage of Maid Protect360 PRO?
How does Maid Protect360 PRO compare to other maid insurance plans?
What should I do to claim benefits under Maid Protect360 PRO?
